titles.head: Secret Email Service
titles.sub: iExec creates the technologies for individuals and organizations to create, protect and develop their digital estate.

protected-data.protect-data-message: Protect your address with iExec. Your email address stays secret, only your name will be shared with the organization.
protected-data.no-protected-data: You have no protected address yet.
